I' m not sure if it is related to my collision settings. Here is a gif about it <denchmark-link:https://camo.githubusercontent.com/e22b44dd5132b336b23c5b214468762f6e505e258864c71a5cfd68db7ac7847e/687474703a2f2f696d6167652e6c6c736576656e722e636e2f6275672e676966></denchmark-link>

we also meet the same question. In HITL Simulation,sometimes we can't takeoff the drone. Even the drone takeoff successfully ,the drone seem crazy.It can't hoverï¼Œconstant rising and shaking.

I found the problem with PX4 1.8.2 that stops takeoff from working. They removed a module that is needed for HITL mode to work, namely, "pwm_sim_out" and so I built a new version of the v1.8.2 with this module included and takeoff and normally flying works again.
